text: aṭicceātukkappeṭṭirunna ā janataykk‌, nāṁ anugrahicca, kiḻakkuṁ paṭiññāṟumuḷḷa bhūpradēśaṅṅaḷ nāṁ avakāśappeṭuttikeāṭukkukayuṁ ceytu. isrāyīl santatikaḷil, avar kṣamiccatinṟe phalamāyi ninṟe rakṣitāvinṟe uttamamāya vacanaṁ niṟavēṟukayuṁ, phir'aunuṁ avanṟe janatayuṁ nirmiccukeāṇṭirunnatuṁ, avar keṭṭi uyarttiyirunnatuṁ nāṁ takartt kaḷayukayuṁ ceytu
